participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and passionate about learning, but sometimes struggles with taking advice.
participant_1.background: I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor. I work in accounting. I cannot get enough of Lindsey Stirling's music. I have a library in my house where I keep all my favorite books, but The Great Gatsby is my favorite. When people do not like my social media posts, it upsets me.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, enjoys spending time with family and pets.
participant_2.background: My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry. I go to a private high school. I am not a big sports fan; I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job. I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy. I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_2. I go to a private high school. How about you?
I'm participant_1, I work in accounting.
Oh, that sounds interesting. Do you enjoy it?
Yes, I do. I get to learn about the world and help people with their finances.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, Mango, and my job at the food pantry.
I'm a big fan of Mangoes, they're so sweet and juicy! What kind of dog do you have?
A golden retriever. She's the sweetest dog ever.
I bet she is! I love dogs.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love The Great Gatsby. It's such a beautiful and tragic story.
I've heard good things about it, I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a classic for a reason.
